name: Loopy Keys LD47
description:
In Loopy Keys you play an everyman just trying to go to work but it seems as if you cannot leave your house without triggering some sort of time loop! And every-time you re-awaken your keys are missing! Use WASD to move around, click with your mouse to pickup and throw objects and figure out whats going on!

Made in 72 Hours for the Ludum Dare 47 Game Jam!
